author: rgerosa
body:
With this PR, we have updated the tracker online source code to be compliant with gcc 7.0. This PR follows [0], which was merged in the gcc630 branch. With respect to the past, where a huge patch file with O(20k) lines was used to patch the tkonline code to compile under gcc7,  we have now produced a new tarball for the source code, as indicated in the spec file.

[0]https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/3709
title: Tracker daq 4.2 gcc700
